capMiddle=middle?window.cleanUp.standard(middle.toLowerCase()):'';     var capLast=last?window.cleanUp.standard(last.toLowerCase()):'';     if(first!==capFirst||first.indexOf('.')>-1){       fix=true;     }     if(middle&&(middle!==capMiddle||middle.indexOf('.')>-1)){       fix=true;     }     if(last!==capLast||last.indexOf('.')>-1){       fix=true;     }      return fix;   } }

Welp, you have a choice to make:
1. Click Confirm to update the address and continue.
2. Or enter a tag:
     "Districts Confirmed Manually" or just "manual"
     "Districts Based On 5 Digit Zip" or just "digit"
     ... and click Confirm to update and continue to the tag tab.
3. Or click Cancel to stop automation.
